title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 37.4 - Sales through vending machines
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 37.4 - Sales through vending machines

State Regulations

When dairy products or melloream are sold through vending
machines, such vending machines, including any labeling on the selector
devices, shall clearly and correctly indicate the products
vended. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
37.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
